title: Free premium cable TV, Sparkling swimming pool, Unfurnished apartments
posting_body: ['Paradise Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Bad Credit OK', '-No long term lease required', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Easy freeway access', '-Large studio and one bedroom apartments', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-On Las Vegas RTC bus line', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
